options.content:
# Documentation

**This template in the aim to manage one synthetic Dashboard from many data sources.**

Some documentation [is available here](https://github.com/renaudrenaud/pi-hosted_rpi_monitor/wiki/One-Dashboard-many-Computers).


**Note**

* This template use 3 same rows: SBC-1, SBC-2, SBC-3
* The data source for each panel is the default one
* in order to show data from another data source, edit a panel and select another data source

Of course you have to define your alternate data sources before panel edition.

title: SBCs Metrics Template
